docs.snippet: BOARD OF ALDERMEN. HEALTH WARDENS CONFIRMED--INCREASE OF SALARIES OF VARIOUS OFFICIALS--PORTRAITS OF EX-GOV. KING AND MAYOR TIEMANN--A. V. STOUT REAPPOINTED CITY CHAMBERLAIN. The Board of Aldermen met at 2 P. M. Yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: BOARD OF ALDERMEN. HEALTH WARDENS CONFIRMED--INCREASE OF SALARIES OF VARIOUS OFFICIALS--PORTRAITS OF EX-GOV. KING AND MAYOR TIEMANN--A. V. STOUT REAPPOINTED CITY CHAMBERLAIN. The Board of Aldermen met at 2 P. M. Yesterday.

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New York Times: Permit me to correct a somewhat serious error which your reporter has made in relation to my remarks in the Health Convention at the Cooper Institute. I am reported as having "defied the drug physicians to explain...
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New York Times: Permit me to correct a somewhat serious error which your reporter has made in relation to my remarks in the Health Convention at the Cooper Institute. I am reported as having "defied the drug physicians to explain the theory of any one disease, or the effect of any one medicine." What I did say has a very different meaning.

docs.snippet: In spite of the storm, about a hundred and fifty persons assembled at the Cooper Institute yesterday afternoon to attend the adjourned session of the Health Convention.

headline.main: NATIONAL HEALTH CONVENTION.; Second Day's Proceedings at the Cooper Institute--The Doctors Disagree,.

docs.lead_paragraph: In spite of the storm, about a hundred and fifty persons assembled at the Cooper Institute yesterday afternoon to attend the adjourned session of the Health Convention.
